title: Galactic Night Sky.
content:
# Galactic Night Sky

Welcome to Galactic Night Sky, a website dedicated to exploring the beauty and wonder of our universe. Our site features stunning images of the night sky, including the Milky Way galaxy visible overhead.

Join us on a journey through space and time as we showcase the most awe-inspiring sights in the cosmos. From distant galaxies to colorful nebulae, our collection of images will leave you mesmerized.

Whether you're an amateur astronomer or simply a lover of all things celestial, Galactic Night Sky is the perfect destination for exploring the wonders of the universe. So sit back, relax, and let us take you on a journey through the stars.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of a starry night sky, with the Milky Way galaxy visible overhead."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
